body:
### Steps to reproduce

spack -d install  kim-api@2.2.1   %gcc@10.2.0


Decompressing the txz compressed package failed with the parameter oxf, but succeeded with oxJf．
How to modify the parameters of tar？

### Error message

==> [2021-11-09-17:43:52.242393] '/bin/tar' '-oxf' '/tmp/globus/spack-stage/spack-stage-kim-api-2.2.1-q2r6i2hujkagi5klbidhkjpbr242zwov/kim-api-2.2.1.txz'          [0/1956]
/bin/tar: This does not look like a tar archive
/bin/tar: Skipping to next header
/bin/tar: Exiting with failure status due to previous errors


### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.1
* **Python:** 2.6.6
* **Platform:** linux-neokylin3-nehalem
* **Concretizer:** original

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [X] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
title: got an error " This does not look like a tar archive"
